title: The Romance of brown coal
creator_credit: Frank Hurley and State Electricity Commission of Victoria
brief_description: Illustrates how brown coal has been formed in the Latrobe Valley. Also shows the mining of brown coal and the conveyance of the coal from the open cut to the power house and briquetting plant.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Hurley and State Electricity Commission of Victoria
